questions.minister: Minister of Water Development and Sanitation
parts: (a) why the water reticulation project in Mungwi District has not commenced despite the contract being awarded in 2019;
(b) what the cause of the delay in commencing the project is;
(c) what the cost of the project is; and
(d) what the time frame for the completion of the project is.
(a) when Mapatizya Parliamentary Constituency will be connected to the national electricity grid; and

questions.minister: Minister of Finance and National Planning
parts: (a) how many pensioners were paid, countrywide, from 2017 to 2021, year by year;
(b) how many pensioners were not paid, as of December, 2021;
(c) how much money was owed to the pensioners as of the same date;
(d) whether there are any pensioners that did not receive their monthly pension, as of January, 2022; and
